comment:
Fermentation Schedule: 
Pitch 66 
3 Days @ 67 
Add Dry Hop #1 
2 More Days @ 67 
Add Dry Hop #2, kick up to 70
X Days @ 70 (Max 14 Days)
Check Gravity for Completeness 
Cold Crash & Keg when Fermentation Complete (YES - Gelatin)

BJCP Blonde Ale (Hop's) (5g)
Day 3 = 0.5 oz Citra
Day 3 = 0.5 oz Willamette
Day 5 = 0.5 oz Citra
Day 5 = 0.5 oz Willamette
DDH (NE) Blonde Ale (Hop's) (5g)
Day 3 = 1 oz Citra (CRYO)
Day 3 = 1 oz Willamette
Day 5 = 1 oz Citra
Day 5 = 1 oz Willamette
Over hopped the beer. 3.0 will have far less hops and that should make it more to style.
